pyqgis_plugin.name: .ROSOR Waypoint Altitude Embedder
pyqgis_plugin.description: ROSOR's tool to embed alt info into waypoints converting flightlines and surface/ground data into 3D waypoints with given clearance to ensure safe drone navigation

pyqgis_plugin.name: .ROSOR Base Mag QAQC
pyqgis_plugin.description: ROSOR's tool that compares Base mag and Air mag recording times and other QaQc things.

pyqgis_plugin.name: .ROSOR Flightline Creator
pyqgis_plugin.description: ROSOR's tool to create flightlines within a polygon

pyqgis_plugin.name: .ROSOR Mag Clipper
pyqgis_plugin.description: ROSOR's tool that takes proprietary ".magdata" and converts to csv then clips it and does QaQc.

pyqgis_plugin.name: .ROSOR Mass Import CSVs or KMLs
pyqgis_plugin.description: ROSOR's tool to mass import csv or kml files from a folder, and match the file structure using layer groups.

pyqgis_plugin.name: .ROSOR Slope Analyzer
pyqgis_plugin.description: ROSOR's tool that shows the user how steep the terain is.
